name: 2025 The 8th International Conference on Electronics, Communications and Control Engineering
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted papers will be published into Lecture Notes in Electrical Engineering (Electronic ISSN: 1876-1119 & Print ISSN: 1876-1100) as a proceedings book volume. The book series will be indexed by EI Compendex, SCOPUS, INSPEC, SCImago and other database. ❉ ICECC 2024 conference proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-3503-6719-5) IEEE Xplore | Ei Compendex | Scopus ❉ ICECC 2023 conference proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0000-2) ACM Digital Library | Ei Compendex | Scopus ❉ ICECC 2022 conference proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9584-7) ACM Digital Library | Ei Compendex | Scopus ❉ ICECC 2021 conference proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8912-9) ACM Digital Library | Ei Compendex | Scopus ❉ ICECC 2020 conference proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-7499-6) ACM Digital Library | Ei Compendex | Scopus ❉ ICECC 2019 conference proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-6263-4) ACM Digital Library | Ei Compendex | Scopus ❉ ICECC 2018 conference proceedings (ISSN: 1742-6596) IOP Conference Series: Journal of Physics | Ei Compendex | Scopus Journal Publication: International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications (IJEETC) ISSN: 2319-2518 (Online) CiteScore 2023: 5.9 DOI: 10.18178/ijeetc Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (since 2017), Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Journal of Communications (JCM) ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print) CiteScore 2023: 3.4 DOI: 10.12720/jcm Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, DBLP, CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc. International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (IJMERR) ISSN: 2278-0149 (Online) CiteScore 2023: 2.8 DOI: 10.18178/ijmerr Abstracting/Indexing: ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
